member.name: P:Microsoft.Commerce.Application.Common.Configuration.CommerceSite.CommerceServerCache.LoaderProgId
member.summary: Gets or sets the COM ProgID of the object used for seeding the cache. This attribute is required if the cache type is set to Custom. Otherwise, it is optional.

member.summary: Gets or sets the COM ProgID of the object used for writing cache changes to an external source. This attribute is optional.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Commerce.Application.Common.Configuration.CommerceSite.CommerceServerCache.CacheObjectProgId
member.summary: Gets or sets the COM ProgId of the object to use as transient storage for cached data. The default value is "Commerce.Dictionary". This attribute is optional.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Commerce.Application.Common.Configuration.CommerceSite.CommerceServerCache.RefreshInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of seconds until the cache expires and the loader is invoked to refill the cache. The value of this attribute must represent an integer.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Commerce.Application.Common.Configuration.CommerceSite.CommerceServerCache.RetryInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of seconds the cache manager will wait before attempting to refill the cache if an error is encountered. The value of this attribute must represent an integer. The default value is 60.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Commerce.Application.Common.Configuration.CommerceSite.CommerceServerCache.MaxSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, of the cache. You should specify this attribute only when the value of the type attribute is "Custom". The value of the CacheSize key of the cache configuration dictionary is set to the value of this attribute. The cache loader component uses this value as specified by the loaderProgId attribute. The value of this attribute must represent an integer. This attribute is optional.

SearchPurchaseOrder
SearchBaskets
